ygData.subject: Re: Cross-class research?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m going to assume this is just a rumor.  I wouldn t see the point of building another mage type except Wizard if this were true.  That would kind of throw
ygData.messageBody:
I'm going to assume this is just a rumor. I wouldn't see the point of building another mage type except Wizard if this were true. That would kind of throw the balance of character classes off a bit. Wizard's would be everywhere! I could be wrong.....

Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: VorteksJRC@... [SMTP:VorteksJRC@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 6:25 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Cross-class research?

From: VorteksJRC@...

That would be very cool. As a magician I am very envious over the wizzards
location-specific gate spells. Let me know what you find out.



In a message dated 5/11/99 2:46:06 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
ecoyle@... writes:

<< 've heard rumors that it's possible for a wizard, through research, to
learn spells that would otherwise be available only to other classes. For
example, I am hoping this is the case with my Wizard, I want to learn SoW
desperately (don't we all?).

SOE needs to do a better job of explaining research. ;)
>>
